sen.e: In Sonpi Bunmyaku (a text compiled in the fourteenth century that records the lineages of the aristocracy), she was called one of three beautiful women of Imperial Reigns and declared as a talented woman.

sen.e: She became one of FUJIWARA no Kaneie's wives and had a child, FUJIWARA no Michitsuna.

sen.j: 晩年は摂政になった夫に省みられる事も少なく寂しい生活を送ったと言われているが詳細は不明。
sen.e: Her husband, who became Sessho (regent), did not reflect her, so she spent lonely life in her later years, but details are unknown.
Her husband, who became Sessho (regent), did not pay attention to her, so she was lonely in her later years, but details are unknown.
sen.cmt: reflect->pay attention to; spent lonely life->was lonely
sen.e: Her husband, who became Sessho (regent), did not pay attention to her, so she was said to be lonely in her later years, but details are unknown.
sen.cmt: said to be を挿入しました。

sen.j: 蜻蛉日記は没年より約二十年前、三十九歳の大晦日を最後に筆が途絶えている。
sen.e: In Kagero Nikki, her last diary was on New Year's Eve at the age of thirty nine, which was twenty years ago from the year of her death.
In Kagero Nikki, her last diary entry was on New Year's Eve at the age of thirty nine, which was twenty years before date of her death.
sen.cmt: “ago” is always used from the standpoint of the present
sen.e: In Kagero Nikki, her last diary entry was on New Year's Eve at the age of 39, which was 20 years before date of her death.
sen.cmt: それぞれ39、20とアラビア数字に修正しました。
